title: Gauge-field mixing in supersymmetric cosmic string theories
abstract: In this paper, following a stream of investigation of supersymetric gauge theories with cosmic string solutions, we contemplate the possibility of building up a superconducting cosmic string with a gauge-field mixing in conection with to a U(1) x U(1)'-symmetry. Both spontaneous breakings, of gauge and supersymmetry, are thoroughly analysed and the fermion zero-modes are worked out. The role of the gauge-field mixing parameter is elucidated in conection with the string configuration.
